Web Developer/Bioinformatics

University of North Carolina at Charlotte Bioinformatics lab with interests in next generation sequencing for public health and natural science applications seeks an on site developer familiar with service oriented architectures and this skill set:.

Scripting experience (i.e. python, perl, and/or ruby) in environments that make use of HPC resources like PBS/Torque, SSH and SFTP protocols.

RESTful and WSDL web services development.

Web application development using frameworks like Ruby on Rails and .NET

Relational database development.

please email résumé to unccpostdoc@gmail.com
